description: This is a market on whether Slovakia or Spain will win their Euro 2020 match, scheduled for June 23, 2021 at 12:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Slovakia” if Slovakia wins the match, or “Spain” if Spain wins the match. If the match ends in a tie, the market will resolve to 50-50. If, for any reason, this match is postponed and a new match date is set for a start time of June 30, 2021, 12:00 PM ET or earlier, the same rules for market resolution will apply for the rescheduled match. If this match is rescheduled for a start time on any date after June 30, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, or is canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
